channel.title: [317]Help for Rep... (Delta,Xion) [317]
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]yea, i need help with couple things, who ever helps i will be glad to give them rep++
so yea couple things....................
-how to able knifes(delta source) search dint give me want i wanted.
-how to make a single zone into multi zone(for bandos)
[s]-how to add wilderness zone under edge( where choas druids are)[/s]TUTZ FTW
-fixing ::pure command(be able to use it only once)
[s]-how to fixe a slot(hat into weapon)[/s]searching ownz
-how to make 30minutes timer when you make a new account(cant trade, cant drop, cant chanllenge anyone at duel area and cannot lose any itemss in the 30 first minutes)
-how can i make when i click on(case:5009 that i need to kill 20 of the following npc = 100, and would have a kill counter in chatbox or in top of the screen)
search botton ownz!
please anyone help for any of theese?:P[/b][/size]
